# Alex Leung

> Syntropy Engineer and Programmer based in Waterloo, Ontario, Canada. Licensed Professional Engineer (P.Eng.) with expertise in distributed systems, AI engineering, and technical leadership.

## Background

Alex Leung is a software engineer currently working at Jetson. He holds a Master of Science in Electrical and Computer Engineering from Georgia Institute of Technology and a Bachelor of Applied Science in Electrical Engineering from the University of Waterloo.

He is a licensed Professional Engineer (P.Eng.) through Professional Engineers Ontario (PEO).

## Areas of Expertise

- Distributed Systems
- AI Engineering
- Embedded Systems
- Web Development
- Systems Design
- Technical Leadership
